ctu_text: The amounts taken are noted in the passbook and a receipt is issued. \n - After one year, the beneficiary&amp;#39;s subscription is renewed upon payment of a renewal fee of \u20b930/- and submission of an application in Form-27A. \n - If not renewed the registration of the beneficiary is cancelled after the expiry of one year. Fresh application for renewal to be submitted to the ALC for consideration.

caption: Poster 2/5 – Eligibility (numbers verified)

ctu_text:
- The applicant should have engaged in building and construction work for at least 90 days in a given year. 

> **For the Application of the Welfare Scheme:**


 - The applicant should be a registered member Under the Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board of West Bengal. 
 - The applicant should have at least 6 months of membership with the Board. 
 - Purchased tools should relate to the applicant&#39;s profession.
caption: Poster 3/5 – Procedure (numbers verified)

Kolkata-700001
Helpline of Labour Department, Govt. of West Bengal (Shramik Sathi): 1800-103-0009
&gt; **Note:**


 - Upon successful verification, the construction worker is registered and an identity card and passbook are issued to him/ her. ₹20/- as the registration fee and ₹30/- as yearly subscription is taken.
